basics.name: Anonymous
basics.label: Engineering Assistant
basics.summary: Retired Engineering Assistant with 25 years of telecommunications experience, excellent CAD drafting skills and quality clerical abilities.

skills.name: Engineering Skills
keywords: Self-taught skills in office party and event planning and decorating

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Utilized company computers and records to obtain information for the design. Used engineering methods to prepare designs. Tracked and monitored construction. Utilized computer drafting tools. Completed site visits on foot. Wore appropriate Engineering safety equipment, when required. Performed daily clerical office work and additional duties as required.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared diagrams, schematics, work orders, and maintained records. Updated and maintained maps, logs, drawings, graphs, charts. Utilized CADD (Computer Assisted Drafting Design). Acted as point of contact for engineering handoffs, facility checks, inquiries, information requests and etc. Corrected and updated NTAS database. Occasionally assisted the engineers on field site surveys.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed clerical office duties. Assisted Planners in updating and tracking cable facility records.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Answered customer complaint calls regarding telephone service issues. Volunteered to setup and decorate for office functions and events.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Handled all office and clerical responsibilities.
